result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

9:13 AM Defendant Landon W. Burkett in court, in custody.  Attorney Maggie R Crawford in court for Landon W. Burkett.  Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin. Counter offer and discovery sent to DA's office from defense. Waiting for response.  
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Information tracks complaint waives reading and enters NOT GUILTY Plea.

11:29 AM Defendant Landon W. Burkett in court.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Maggie R Crawford in court for Landon W. Burkett Complaint reviewed and Deft. waives reading of complaint.

PQW received/reviewed by Court. Court finds waiver to be made freely and voluntarily. Court finds probable cause a felony has been committed by this defendant and is bound over to the circuit court. Present bond cont'd. Notice of Hearing given to Deft. in court.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on June 3, 2022 at 11:30 am.

9:35 AM Defendant Landon W. Burkett in court, in custody.  Atty Hansen SPD appears with deft.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. SPD for today's purpose only.  Conflict of interest.  Atty Crawford checking with her office for conflict.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 11:30 am.  Notice of Hearing given to Deft. in Jail.
NOH sent to jail for deft.

Defendant shall not have direct or indirect contact w/ J.G; J.C.; D.W.; N.W.  May go to and from school and work.  Must not be out of household for any other reason.  Defendant shall immediately report to the Sheriff's Department for fingerprinting and photographing.

1:57 PM Defendant Landon W. Burkett appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. SPD Spansail appears for bond purposes only.  Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel/SPD.  Bond is set.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
